PulseCheck.name: PulseCheck
PulseCheck.description: Represents the wellbeing of a learner based on a primary metric or criteria at a specific date and time.

AssociatedObjectId.description: The object associated with the student's responses to a Pulse Check.

AssociatedRecordTypeId.description: The record type of the object associated with the student's responses to a Pulse Check.

Category.description: Specifies the category of the Pulse Check.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency associated with the Pulse Check.

DaysOfWeek.description: The days of the week for which the pulse check is scheduled. This field contains a bit mask. Monday = 64 Tuesday = 32 Wednesday = 16 Thursday = 8 Friday = 4 Saturday = 2 Sunday = 1

Description.description: The description of the Pulse Check.

EndDate.description: The date and time when the Pulse Check ends.

ExpiryInDays.description: The number of days the Pulse Check is active.

Frequency.description: Specifies the frequency that the Pulse Check occurs.

IsRecurring.description: Indicates whether the Pulse Check is recurring (true) or not (fales).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

Name.description: The name for the Pulse Check.

Occurrences.description: The number of occurrences of the Pulse Check.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

PrimaryQuestionId.description: The primary assessment question associated with the Pulse Check.

PulseCheckTemplateId.description: The Pulse Check Template associated with the Pulse Check.

Source.description: The criteria based sharing rule or flow that triggered the Pulse Check.

StartDate.description: The date and time when the Pulse Check starts.
